attributes.action: request that the csa pays the parent with care on the same day each month.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My CSA payments come directly from my ex husbands employers, bipassing him completely. However they give them until the 19th of each month to transfer funds, and then it can take upto another 10 days for the money to reach me and the children, which seems a little unfair considering the money could be transfered via bacs overnight, as it is to their father!
Thus making it impossible to plan finances from month to month.
